summary: Updated to 3.0 now. Her body will work with all types now. I updated Willow\'s warpaint a little to make it look like it was applied by fingers. I updated her hair with a new hair from Apachii. I left her face alone completely but removed her spells in keeping with her movie character.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1345062312.jpg[/img]
 

[b][size=4]Etain from the movie Centurion - This is my interpretation of one of my favorite movie characters \"Etain the Pict Scout\" played by Olga Kurylenko in the film Centurion. While by no means a perfect replica, with the limited resources I had to work with I am happy with her final version. I spent nearly a week working on her, feeling like I was going to go mad at times trying to get her facial features correct. I have edited Willows Warpaint that she made for me so that it is closer to the original movies warpaint. I basically took the wide brush strokes and made them rounded so they look like they were applied by fingers. I still owe much thanks for Willow\'s help on this!!![/b][/size]

[b][size=3]Update 3.0[/b][/size]

[b][size= 2]Face: Warpaint Updated to look more like the movie character but her face is the same as version 2.0 for purists
Weight: Body Weight Updated to 70% at the scale and will now work with all female bodies
Spells: No Spells whatsoever in keeping with the original movie character
Relationships: No relationship to wolves (didn\'t really work anyway) 
Combat: She is at a Calculated Level 45 or Auto-level from 10 to 82 Two Handed Boss.
Armor: Prefers light armor in keeping with the movie character 
Hair: New Hair from Apachii that I feel matches the movies a little closer. Note: Since she is created using the NPC Editor I removed each and every extra Apachii hair file from her. There should be no extra hairs in the \"showracemenu\" with version 3.0 in use.
Eyes: Hazel Green, I used \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes of Beauty[/url]\" on her for this update. [/b][/size]

[b][size=3]Required Files[/size][/b]

[B][COLOR=red][size= 2]ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 is REQUIRED for Version 3.0[/size][/B][/COLOR] 

[B][COLOR=red][size= 2]ApachiiSkyHair 1.4 or later is REQUIRED for Version 2.0[/size][/B][/COLOR] 

[b][size=3] Miscellaneous[/b][/size]

[b][size= 2]I added a standalone file of the warpaint for those that like the hair on version 2.0. It is located under miscellaneous in downloads.[/b][/size]  

[b][color= cornflowerblue]Location: Winking Skeever
Coloring and Physical Attributes: I customized her hair color, skin tone and of course her facial structure and makeup coloring. I used Ms. Kurylenko\'s physical stats on her scaling ( 27% for version 2.0) and height. 
Face: Better Females by Bella - Makeup Option 1 and No Shine Option: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Skin: Glossy Skin for all female bodymod - v05 - No Gloss http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=26003
Shown - Vanilla Armor for CBBE by Caliente - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12273
Cloak; Winter is coming Timber Wolf Cloak Trimmed in White Fur. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13486
Her Spear (Which is the closest to the one in the movie I could find) is from Bob\'s Armory (Thanks Mr. Dave!) It is called a Partisan. (Please endorse his work, it is absolutely incredible!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12060
Navetsea\'s body textures were used as well (and as usual), highly endorsed!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
Boots - Remodeled Karliah by Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
Gold Bracelets - Gatti 06 Branwen Armor for CBBEv3 by Gatti:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14340[/b][/color]

[b]For more of 83Willow\'s awesome work click this link:[/b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=938388]83Willow[/url]

[b][size= 3]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b][/size]
author: FalmerBane
